channel.title: m1 on Life inside a computer
channel.description: Recent content in m1 on Life inside a computer

item.title: Working with the M1 mac
item.description: After a bit of faffing around with invoicing and reimbursing, I have finally managed to get ahold of a machine specifically for work. At my company’s request, I have purchased a MacBook Pro with the Apple M1 chip. Anybody who has read my blog knows I have significant misgivings about Apple, their products, and their business practices. I am generally not a fan of working with Macs, but I must confess I was intrigued to see how this new chip would perform.
